error.toggle_failed: Failed to blink the light. Check signal strength or power.
error.device_disappeared: The selected device is no longer available.
error.not_supported: This device model is not supported by the integration.
error.already_configured: This device has already been configured.
error.no_devices_found: No supported LEDnetWF lights were found nearby.
error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to the device. Make sure it's powered on and nearby.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.device_disappeared: The selected device was not found again
abort.unsupported_device: The selected device is not supported

user.title: Device Configuration
user.description: It is recommended to make configuration changes via the app. This functionality is included for convenience and is not complete.
